kw.name: Dado que o browser esteja aberto
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: Cenário 1 - Confirmar se o produto é apresentado

kw.name: Dado que realizei a consulta de “Dress” no campo de pesquisa E apresentou produtos a serem escolhidos
Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.arg: ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="note-search"]' contains exact text 'TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to browser.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado as informações do produto
Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: a white midi dress in a milkmaid style featuring puff detail sleeves and split on the reverse.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="product-essential__description"]' contains exact text 'a white midi dress in a milkmaid style featuring puff detail sleeves and split on the reverse.'.

test.name: Cenário 3 - Escolhendo o tipo de tamanho do produto

kw.name: Quando clico na opção de tamanho
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado as opções de escolha de tamanho
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

test.name: Cenário 2 - Escolhendo o tipo de cor do produto

kw.name: Quando clico na opção de cor
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado as opções de escolha de cor E quando seleciono a cor é apresentado a foto com a cor escolhida
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado as informações adicionais
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="additional_information_tab active"]' contains exact text 'ADDITIONAL INFORMATION'.

test.name: Cenário 6 - Opções de compartilhamento do produto nas redes sociais

kw.name: Então é apresentado os ícones das redes sociais
Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Então é apresentado os produtos relacionados
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="title-related"]' contains exact text 'RELATED PRODUCTS'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
